title: Music - Background - Casual Vol1
description: Enhance the player experience with the exclusive pack of 20 casual songs. Add a relaxing and enjoyable touch to your games with these smooth, high-quality soundtracks!
longDescription:
🎮 Casual Game Music Pack 🎮


Youtube Demo: here


Immerse yourself in the world of casual gaming with the specially designed music pack to enhance the player experience. This pack contains 20 unique tracks, each created with the aim of capturing the essence of casual gaming.


Each track has been produced to ensure it fits perfectly into a variety of gaming scenarios, whether it's a relaxing environment, a challenge stage or a thrilling moment of victory.


The songs are versatile and can be used in various game genres - from puzzle games to adventure games. They are easy to integrate and fully compatible with Unreal Engine.


With this pack, you'll have the perfect soundtrack to bring your game to life. Take advantage of the quality and diversity that our casual gaming music pack has to offer and give your players the immersive listening experience they deserve!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Channel: 2 channels
  •  Additional: Stereo
  • Encoding: PCM

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 42:26

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://captainthatch.forgedream.com

Important/Additional Notes:
